articles.title: "You Are Causing Me A Real Problem...": Biden To PM On Upcoming US Trip - NDTV
articles.description: During a meeting of Quad leaders in Tokyo yesterday, US President Joe Biden and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese came up to Prime Minister Narendra Modi with a peculiar challenge.
articles.content:
PM Modi has used his foreign visits as a vehicle to promote Indian culture.

articles.title: "We Strongly Oppose...": Quad Countries' Thinly Veiled Swipe At China - NDTV
articles.description: The leaders of the Quad group -- Australia, India, Japan and the United States -- delivered a thinly veiled swipe at Beijing's behaviour Saturday at a summit in Hiroshima.
articles.content:
